title: U.S. tart cherry production 2018 , by state
summary: This chart shows the U.S. tart cherry in Michigan 2018 compared with that in Utah and the Wisconsin .
In Michigan there was a 201.0 million difference in the salaries of men and women .
In Utah the difference was 10.9 million .
gold: This statistic highlights the tart cherry production in the United States in 2018 , by state . In Michigan , some 201 million pounds of tart cherries were produced in that year .
